description: Centralized Python virtual environment manager â€” pyenv-style workflow powered by uv. Written in Rust.
rules: scoop is a CLI tool installed via `cargo install scoop-uv`. The binary name is `scoop`, the crate name is `scoop-uv`. Config lives at ~/.scoop/config.json (JSON, not TOML). Virtual environments are stored in ~/.scoop/virtualenvs/. Shell integration uses eval pattern (like pyenv). Supports 4 shells: bash, zsh, fish, powershell. Supports 4 languages: en, ko, ja, pt-BR. MSRV is 1.85 (Rust Edition 2024). For complete LLM reference, see llms-full.txt.
